title: Grand Slam
overview: Pedro N. Gomez, a Hispanic bounty hunter who teamed with a Caucasian partner to track down bail-bond jumpers in the Los Angeles area. Other cast members included Abel Franco as Al Ramirez, the owner of Aztec Bail Bonds; and Lupe Ontiveros as Grandma Gomez. Pedro's car license plate reads: VATO UNO.
